node.name: Ping Sweeps
node.rich_text:
Ping Sweep: ICMP echo Request & ICMP echo reply
# nmap -sn -PS target : This sends ICMP Echo Requests and TCP SYN packets to determine reachable hosts.
#

option is used for TCP SYN Ping on ports 21, 22, and 25.
#

option specifies that TCP SYN Ping should be sent to ports 21, 22, and 25. The practical difference is subtle, and in practice, both commands are likely to behave similarly. However, the correct usage would be the first command without the
